title: Orbea Denna First Look: The Basques Enter the E-Gravel Scene
content:
Orbea's excellent e-road bike, the Gain, has gravel builds available, but they have never felt quite right off-road. Now Orbea has a properly tuned e-gravel bike.

Read the full article at Orbea Denna First Look: The Basques Enter the E-Gravel Scene on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
